content: मार्जन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मृज्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Cleansing, purifying. --नं {@--1@} Cleansing, cleaning, purifying. {@--2@} Wiping or rubbing off. {@--3@} Effacing, wiping away. {@--4@} Cleansing the person by rubbing it with unguents. {@--5@} Sprinkling the person with water by means of the hand, a blade of Kuśa grass &c. --नः The tree called {%Lodhra%}. --ना {@--1@} Cleansing, purifying, cleaning. {@--2@} The sound of a drum; मायूरीमदयति मार्जना मनांसि <ls>M. 1. 21.</ls> --नी A broom, brush.
